Renton.Mercer Island High School:
Mercer Island High School (MIHS) is a public high school located in Mercer Island, Washington in the United States, as part of the Mercer Island School District.
As of the 2014-15 school year, the school had an enrollment of 1,416 students and 69.6 classroom teachers (on an FTE basis), for a student–teacher ratio of 20.3:1. There were 54 students (3.8% of enrollment) eligible for free lunch and 10 (0.7% of students) eligible for reduced-cost lunch.
